remarks: Axiom of Collection.  Axiom 7 of [Crosilla], p.  "Axioms of CZF and IZF" (with unnecessary quantifier removed).  It is similar to ~ bnd but uses a freeness hypothesis in place of one of the distinct variable constraints.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Aug-2018.)
statement:
ax-coll.1 $e |- F/ b ph $.
ax-coll $p |- ( A. x e. a E. y ph -> E. b A. x e. a E. y e. b ph ) $.
$d a b x y $.
